title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about heavy rain according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain: Rain in general is one of the good symbols in life that indicates sustenance, blessing, planting, fruitful plants and other good news, and certainly this is also in the world of dreams, especially if the vision in general indicates goodness, and below is an explanation of the various signs in which rain appears Abundantly and its interpretation... Follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing heavy rain in a dream? Heavy rain in a dream indicates happy news, great goodness, and many pleasures that will be in the dreamer’s life by God’s command. Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain symbolizes that the dreamer is on his way to fulfilling his desires and reaching dreams. What he wants in life. Heavy rain falling on the roof of the house for a married woman symbolizes that she will have a lot of food coming her way, but she needs to be more careful with money until God blesses her with it. In the event that one owns land and sees heavy rain falling On it in a dream, this means that God will bless him for planting it, and he will obtain a lot of good from it. Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain by Ibn SirinSeeing rain in a dream symbolizes many interpretations depending on the condition of the rain and what is present in the dream. In the event that the viewer sees rain Heavy rain in a place with thunder and lightning, it means that there are many good things and benefits that will accrue to the viewer. When the dreamer sees in a dream that heavy rain fell on him and his clothes got wet, this symbolizes that there is a lot of money that will be his share in the coming period. When A merchant sees heavy rain in a dream and is happy to see it. This is a sign that his trade is popular and that God will bless him. Seeing heavy rain in a sick person’s dream is an important indicator that recovery is near by God’s command and that his health will improve. Whoever has committed sins and disobeyed God a lot and sees heavy rain in his dream, This is good news that God has enabled him to repent and turn away from his deeds and save him from them according to His will. Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain by Ibn Shaheen Imam Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing heavy rain falling in a dream is one of the positive dreams that indicate that a person will obtain many benefits. If a person dreams that heavy rain is falling Accordingly, it symbolizes salvation from judgment, and obtaining comfort and blessings. Whoever does not find a job after seeing in a dream that the rain is heavy, this means that God will bless him with a new job according to his will. When the wife sees heavy rain falling in the dream, this means that the dreamer It will have a lot of goodness and benefits and that God has written blessings upon it for the husband and children. What is the interpretation of a dream of heavy rain for a single woman? The interpretation of heavy rain in a dream for an unmarried woman carries many good signs and good omens. The interpretation of a dream of heavy rain for a single woman indicates that she will arrive To her dreams and that God will help her until she reaches the dreams that she has planned. If the girl sees in her dream that it is raining heavily in her house, this indicates that there is someone who wants to propose to her and will marry her.

If the girl sees in her dream that it is raining heavily in her house, this indicates that there is someone who wants to propose to her and will marry her.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother visiting me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother visiting me in a dream. We will learn in the following lines about the interpretation of a dream about my grandmother visiting me in a dream, according to what the interpreters said. All this and more details. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother visiting me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother visiting me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. And with Therefore, seeing a grandmother can be a sign of kindness and good luck, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a dead grandmother in a dream, this may be evidence of her need for help, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her grandmother dead, she may miss her, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother vomiting In a dream, interpretation of a dream about my grandmother vomiting in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing vomiting in a dream could be a sign of repentance from sins and disobedience, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Vomiting can also express concealing a secret, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself vomiting with difficulty, this may lead to violent repentance. Or the inability to repent, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother chasing me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my grandmother chasing me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, but seeing an old woman chasing me may lead me to food, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees an old woman chasing him, it may indicate advice, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees an old woman chasing her in a dream, this may be evidence of the fulfillment of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream My dead grandmother bathing in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my dead grandmother bathing in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this, except that seeing the dead bathing can relieve the dreamer of his worries and worries, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the dead grandmother bathing in a dream, this may be a sign of goodness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If it is seen An unmarried girl bathes the dead, this may indicate good changes, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that I was carrying my grandmother in my arms in a dream. I dreamed that I was carrying my grandmother in my arms in a dream that can lead to closeness, and God knows the unseen, where he can express his closeness to the grandmother, and God knows the unseen. If A young man saw his grandmother carrying his house. This may lead to a strong relationship with the grandmother, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother sleeping in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my grandmother sleeping in a dream. The grandmother sleeping in your bed can be a sign of stability, as it can express the stability of the family, and God knows the unseen. If a girl sees An unmarried woman has her grandmother sleeping on her pillow in a dream. This may be a sign of family happiness, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her grandmother sleeping in bed, this may lead to stability in her life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my grandmother trying to kill me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my grandmother trying to kill me in a dream. . We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing someone I know trying to kill me in a dream could be a sign of a relationship with this person and God knows the unseen. title: Seeing a woman I know in a dream about a single woman

preview.html: If he embraces a woman he knows in a dream, this means that he will get rid of a big problem that he was experiencing and was upset about at the moment. Interpretation of seeing a woman I know in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that a woman knows her and approaches her in the dream, and quarrels with her in the dream It indicates that there are major problems in the life of this single girl and she cannot get rid of them at this time, and God knows best. And if the unmarried girl looks at a woman she knows, and she gives her food and drink in a dream, and she is happy with them. She declares that she will meet a new person in her life during this Time will make her happy in her life, God willing. The dreamer is a single girl who looks at a woman she knows, and she was looking at her angrily in the dream, and her appearance was bad in the dream. It also explains that this single girl will face major problems in her life and will not be able to get rid of these problems easily. And seeing a woman An unmarried woman in a dream is hugging a woman she knew in the dream, and looking at her calmly and with great happiness in the dream. This is an indication that she will get rid of problems, problems, and bad things in her life, God willing. See also: Interpretation and meaning of seeing an unknown and strange woman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a woman I know in a dream. About a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is marrying a woman, then she knows this well in the dream and has become sad. It also shows that there is a new matter that she and her husband will enter into, something that is on her mind a lot during this time. A married woman looking in a dream says that The woman she knows quarreled with her a lot in the dream. While it indicates that there are great sorrows that this married woman is going through and she cannot get rid of them at this time. Seeing a married woman in a dream means that she is sitting with a woman she knows and loves very much in the dream and is close to her. It indicates This married woman will succeed in getting rid of the problems in her life, and she will live happily, God willing. The dreaming married woman looks at a woman she knows. She was very tired in the dream and felt sick. This is an indication that this married woman will be in trouble with her closest friends now, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a woman I know in a dream about a divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees in a dream that the woman she knows well was sad about her presence in the dream, and is trying to follow her. This indicates that there are bad things in the life of this divorced woman, and she is trying to get rid of them, and God knows best. And seeing a woman A divorced woman says that the woman she knew had a big fight in the dream and became sad. This indicates the problems that arose at this time between her and her ex-husband and she could not get rid of them, and God knows best. And a divorced woman who sees in a dream a woman she knows well, helps her during her illness, and sits with her often. The meaning indicates that a disease has occurred that will afflict this divorced woman at this time in her life, and God is the Most High.

title: What is the interpretation of provocation in a dream by Ibn Sen?

preview.html: Being stabbed in a dream: A challenge is one of the heinous acts that people can do, regardless of the reasons and motives behind it, except in cases of self-defense of course, and seeing a challenge in a dream is one of the dreams that raises fear in the hearts. To many people and makes them wonder about the various clues related to this dream, and this we will explain in detail in the following sections of the article. What is the interpretation of the call in a dream? Seeing a knife in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will face many crises and problems in his life that affect him negatively. And if one dreams That he was stabbed in the stomach with a knife, this is a sign that he will be exposed to a difficult crisis in the coming period because of some corrupt people close to him, and he must be very careful not to be harmed. If a person wants to reach a certain goal in his life and witnesses a challenge in the dream, this is a sign of the presence of obstacles preventing him from achieving what he desires. Seeing a knife more than once in different parts of the dreamer’s body during sleep proves that he is surrounded by bad people. They seek to harm and hurt him. Recalling the dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - suggested that seeing a knife being stabbed in a dream has praiseworthy effects on the dreamer, and we will explain this as follows: Whoever sees himself stabbed in a dream, this is a sign of abundant kindness and abundant sustenance that he will soon become. His path to the dreamer. If an unmarried young man dreams of being stabbed with a knife, this will lead to him being proposed to a good girl in the coming period, his marriage to her, and the formation of a happy family. If someone dreams of being stabbed with a knife that he bought before, this is a sign of protection from the Lord of the Worlds and enjoyment. In good health and a body free of diseases. If a person sees in his dream that he is being stabbed while cutting food, this proves that he has lost something valuable to him and that he has entered into a bad psychological state because of that. Challenge of a single woman’s dreamIf a girl dreams that she was stabbed in a dream, this is a bad omen because A lot of bad things will happen to her. If the girl is a science student and sees the knife in her sleep, this is a sign that she failed in her studies and excelled over her peers. Seeing an unmarried woman being stabbed in a dream could indicate that some corrupt people around her are bewitching her or envious of her. If a girl dreams that her fiancé is stabbing her from behind with a knife, this is a sign that he is corrupt and she should stay away from him so as not to get hurt. When an unmarried woman dreams of being stabbed in front of her parents, this proves that she has committed many wrong actions and made wrong decisions recently that will cause her many problems. Interpretation of dreams about being stabbed With a knife for single women. In interpreting a dream that she was stabbed in the stomach without blood, the jurists said that an unmarried woman on her back or stomach is a sign that she will be harmed or deceived by someone close to her. If an unmarried woman dreams that she was stabbed in the heart, this is a sign of her separation from her lover who She was confused with him because of a close emotional relationship. If a girl dreams that she was stabbed with a knife in her hands, this is a sign that she will go through difficult financial hardship in the coming period.

title: Fear of mice in an unmarried woman’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fear of a mouse in a dream for a single girl: When an unmarried woman sees a mouse entering her house, it starts attacking her and she resists it to chase it in the dream. This indicates that she is exposed to many problems and crises in her home, but God Almighty helps her to get rid of them soon. But if the unmarried girl sees The mouse is trying to get into her closet in a dream. It is a good skin for living, and it is very good on the way to it. It also indicates a change in circumstances from bad to better. When an unmarried girl saw the mouse in her house and killed it in a dream. It is an indication that the dreamer He has strength, determination, determination, and will. The vision is a metaphor for the visionary’s great ambition, through which she reaches the highest levels of her life in general. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream. The interpretation of seeing fear of a mouse in a dream for a married woman. Seeing fear of mice in a dream for a married woman, Ibn Sirin interpreted it as a sign of intense fear of revealing a secret, something that she does not want anyone to know. Or it is an indication that something is about to happen that will change the dreamer’s life for the worse. Seeing many mice in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the presence of Many bad women in her life. It is a warning to her that their presence is destroying her married life, and God knows best. When a married woman sees that a mouse is hiding inside her in a dream, she must be careful here. Because it is a sign that someone close to her is hiding in the guise of friendship, but for She has all hatred and anger. The mouse in a married woman’s house in a dream symbolizes an enemy lurking around and conspiring against her, and God knows best. If a married woman sees an attempt to bring a mouse into her house and is afraid of it and tries to remove it in a dream. This dream suggests that the dreamer is facing many marital problems, but she It will end soon, thanks to God Almighty. And when he saw a mouse inside a married woman’s closet and it was eating all her clothes in the dream. This means that the visionary will lose valuable things in exchange for her comfort and sense of security. And if a married woman sees that a mouse has entered her closet or any place where she is hiding, she can get rid of it. And killing him in the dream. It is a sign of her victory over her enemies in reality. Interpretation of the fear of a mouse in a dream for a man and its meaning. As for the man who sees the mouse attacking him in his dream, he is afraid of it. It is a sign that the dreamer is going through a major crisis in his life. As for the one who sees himself killing the mouse, And he leads him home in a dream. It is a sign of the dreamer’s success in overcoming troubles and passing and feeling comfortable after hardship. And to see the mouse trying to enter the dreamer’s house, but the latter confronts him and prevents him from doing so in the dream. It means that the dreamer gets rid of an enemy who is trying to penetrate his life. A man who sees that a mouse attacks and bites him in a dream. It is a sign that the dreamer will face a big problem in his life, but it will end soon, thanks to God Almighty. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man. The meaning of seeing fear of a mouse in a dream.

title: Interpretation of seeing a rabbit in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a rabbit in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com, as seeing rabbits in a dream is one of the visions that carries many interpretations and associations that we will talk about through our topic about the girl. The single woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the young man, and the divorced woman. What is the interpretation of one person seeing a rabbit in a dream? A single girl sees a rabbit in a dream. Its interpretation varies depending on the color, as the brown color indicates many psychological and social problems that led to the deterioration of her condition. Seeing white rabbits in a dream means hearing the news. Happy, family stability and the presence of love and friendship between them. Seeing a black rabbit in a dream for a single woman symbolizes the achievement of excellence and great success in university and career. See also: Interpretation of seeing an animal’s brain in a dream What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees rabbits in a dream? A married woman who sees rabbits in a dreamWidele On her misbehavior with her husband and her dissatisfaction with him, which caused the collapse of their relationship. A married woman sees small rabbits in a dream, indicating her beauty, femininity, and obtaining fair offspring for girls and boys. What is the interpretation of a man who sees rabbits in a dream? A man who sees white rabbits in a dream is a sign of the imminent marriage of a young man. Single. Seeing a married woman slaughtering rabbits in a dream is a sign of marital disputes and problems. The black rabbit indicates a feeling of constant fear and constant anxiety. The gray rabbit symbolizes hypocrisy, deception, and constant lying. A man seeing rabbits in a dream. The sign of many sons and daughters and a hungry rabbit indicates a deterioration in living standards. And an increase in debt. Seeing a married man hunting rabbits in a dream indicates the loss of many opportunities and not exploiting them appropriately, and deep regret for that. See also: Interpretation of seeing feces from cats, animals, or mice in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a white rabbit in a dream? Seeing a white rabbit in a dream. The dream is a sign that he is making a tremendous effort in his work to reach the highest positions and obtain continuous promotions. Seeing white rabbits in a dream indicates that he is exposed to injustice from his friends at work and his manager and the need to be patient. What is the interpretation of seeing black rabbits in a dream? Seeing black rabbits in a dream indicates his insistence on Achieving his life’s dream and what he always wants and calls to God. Seeing a black rabbit in a dream indicates intelligence, strength of character, sobriety of mind, the death of anxiety and sadness and the arrival of great joy. What is the interpretation of seeing slaughtered rabbits in a dream? Seeing a slaughtered rabbit in a dream indicates his ability to solve problems and manage His life. Seeing a married woman slaughtering many rabbits in a dream indicates bringing goodness, sustenance, and blessings to the dreamer’s life without any fatigue or hardship. What is the interpretation of seeing rabbit skin in a dream? Seeing a rabbit with skin in a dream indicates opening the door to wide livelihood for the visionaries through inheritance or Inheritance. See a man

title: Seeing ants and cockroaches in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing ants and cockroaches in a dream for a single girl: Seeing ants in a dream is one of the things that shows that you think a lot about the life of a single girl. And if ants walk on her body in a dream and she does not like it in the dream, it indicates that she is busy in her life with trivial matters that have no meaning to her. The dream indicates a lot of talk about wrong things and the dreamer’s constant lying. It also indicates that she thinks badly about most of the things that happen to her in life. The only girl who sees many cockroaches flying in front of her eyes in a dream. This is an indication of the many problems that will enter her life without precedent. Warning. An unmarried girl who sees the dream indicates the cancellation of her engagement if she was previously engaged. The dream also indicates deceitful people in her life who are currently very close to her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cockroaches by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing ants and cockroaches in a dream for a married woman. Seeing ants and cockroaches running in a dream For a married woman, it indicates psychological problems. It also indicates that she has been harmed by people close to her in life. She will be preoccupied with many unnecessary matters in her life or in the life of her husband. The dream indicates many sorrows that she will go through and will not end easily in her life. Ibn Sirin explained that the dream is an evil omen for a married woman in her life. The dream indicates problems, troubles, and mental and physical exhaustion in the dreamer’s life. If she kills ants and cockroaches in a dream, this means that she will get rid of her many fears. And if her husband kills them in a dream, this means that they will overcome Their bad fate in their lives. Fear of them in a dream indicates treacherous people who are close to harming her and her family. Interpretation of seeing ants and cockroaches in a dream for a man and its meaning. The dreamer who sees a lot of ants and cockroaches in his house and was very afraid of the dream. It indicates difficult issues that this dreamer is suffering from. Indeed from his work. It also indicates heavy losses that he will grieve greatly, and God knows best. If ants sting him and approach him for a long time in a dream from his body. It says that evil will approach his life and he will do a lot to reach this point. He must warn his life that this The matter will destroy his great effort in his work. If he killed ants and cockroaches in a dream, and defeated them well in the dream, and was happy. The clearest meaning is getting rid of some things that are not suitable in his life, God willing. And he will live with great comfort and great happiness for him in the coming period, And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Seeing ants in a dream for a married woman. The meaning of seeing ants and cockroaches in a pregnant woman’s dream and their interpretation. Seeing ants walking on the body of a pregnant woman in a dream, and they stung her a lot in the dream. This indicates that she will suffer from the moment she gives birth to her child during this period, by God. The Most High, the All-Knowing. And that she will suffer from many health problems and she must always be careful during this period. And if he sees cockroaches flying in a dream and is afraid of their appearance. Here the bad things that she experiences with her husband during this period appear.

title: Interpretation of seeing buying rice in a dream for a single and married woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing buying rice in a dream for unmarried women In a dream, rice is one of the most widely used grains in the world. An article that we will learn about together about the interpretation of the vision of buying rice in a dream for unmarried women in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of buying rice in a dream Below is the interpretation of buying rice in a dream. A person always wants to decipher his dreams and visions. The world of dreams is a very special and vast world, full of mysteries and mysteries that only God and those to whom He gave knowledge know. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying rice or bringing it from his wife is good. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cooked rice in a dream for a single woman. A single woman always seeks happiness because she is a girl in the prime of life who wishes from God Almighty to make her happy, make her heart happy, and fill her world with bliss and pleasure. Below we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about rice: Seeing unmarried people with dirty rice indicates big problems that you will face. Cooked rice in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates marriage, especially if it is delicious. This means that she will have a generous husband. Uncooked rice in a woman’s dream symbolizes your good intentions and great strength. An unmarried woman who sees rice in a dream indicates great and ample sustenance and a lot of kindness from everywhere. Interpretation of a dream about seeing bags of rice in a dream for a married woman seeking A married woman always seeks to improve her circumstances and settle her life with her husband and children, and always aims to be surrounded by love, compassion and peace. Here is the interpretation of seeing Rice for a married woman: Dreaming of a married woman preparing bags of rice and holding large celebrations interprets the fulfillment of her desires and dreams and that she will obtain something valuable such as a house or a car. A husband who buys his wife a large amount of rice in a dream indicates that he will live a beautiful life full of goodness. And happiness and he will get a lot of money and enjoy an aristocratic life. Whoever sees that he will bring bags of rice in his dream, this indicates a great ability to food from where it does not matter. Interpretation of a dream about seeing uncooked rice in a dream. Many dream of rice in a dream, as it is one of the most famous grains in the world. . All countries eat rice and have customs duties, but interpretations in dreams confuse some, and here are the most accurate interpretations of rice in a dream. Grains of rice in a dream indicate happiness and good luck. Rice in a dream symbolizes a lot of money, but it came after a great misfortune. Symbolizes a dream about cooking Rice means taking responsibility, giving, and giving to others. Seeing uncooked rice in a dream symbolizes new friendships and friendly relationships. Anyone who sees rice in a dream while hungry is considered an unpleasant vision, because it can reflect great sadness for its owner. The vision of buying rice is interpreted that the owner He will get abundant and big money and he will invest his money in the right place. Seeing rice plants as dead waste on the ground is interpreted as annoying only indicates extreme poverty and despair. May God protect you from all evil, and knowledge of it. Seeing rice in a dream is food, blessing and goodness. , especially

title: Interpretation of suffocation in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will show you the interpretation of suffocation in a dream in different cases, as this vision is one of the dreamer’s bad dreams that makes him panic and panic, and he may end up waking up frightened. The dreamer may see that he is suddenly drowning or see that someone is suffocating him. Whether it is known or unknown, the dreamer can also see that he is choking himself in the dream, and each of these cases has a different meaning from the other. Does the vision indicate something bad in the dreamer’s life or does it, contrary to reality, indicate something praiseworthy? We will learn this through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of suffocation in a dream. Seeing suffocation in a dream is interpreted as one of the dreams that indicates that the dreamer will be jealous, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees that he is strangling himself in a dream, this vision serves as a warning message that he must reconsider himself when doing some actions that cause him harm. Dream interpretation scholars have also indicated that strangulation in a dream is one of the visions that reflects... The psychological state of the viewer, as it indicates the state of tension, psychological pressure, and psychological pressure that prevails in the dreamer in reality. However, if the dreamer sees that someone is choking him in a dream and he is known in reality, then this vision is an indication of the impending trick and the removal of the worries that he suffers from if he feels pain. But if the dreamer sees that he is choking someone in a dream, then this vision indicates that the dreamer has gone through obstacles and problems and that it is good news for him that these fears are gone. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will commit sins and transgressions in reality. If the dreamer sees that he Strangles an animal in a dream, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is going through a financial crisis in reality. If the dreamer dreams that he drowned because of food, then this dream shows the dreamer’s greed and avarice in reality. Interpretation of strangulation in a dream for a single woman, and this vision in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates She commits sins and disobedience in reality, and it may indicate the presence of a wrong relationship in her life, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees that someone is choking her in a dream, this vision indicates the presence of someone who hates her, hates her, and seeks to harm her in reality. Interpretation of strangulation in a dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this The vision for a married woman is an indication of her weakness in obedience to God, and an indication of her feeling of helplessness regarding something in reality. If the dreamer sees himself drowning in reality, this vision indicates that he has committed sins and disobedience. But if you see a person drowning in a dream, this vision indicates Overcoming enemies, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of suffocation in a pregnant woman’s dream. This dream is one of the hateful dreams for a pregnant woman, because if she sees herself drowning in her husband’s dream, this vision indicates marital strife. This vision does not become good unless he is able to escape from the state of suffocation, As it is a good omen for the dreamer that childbirth will facilitate. If a pregnant woman sees that someone she does not know is strangling her, then this vision shows that she is disobedient to God. For you, the most important thing mentioned in the interpretation of strangulation in manna

If a pregnant woman sees that someone she does not know is strangling her, then this vision shows that she is disobedient to God. For you, the most important thing mentioned in the interpretation of strangulation in manna
